CNY Grab-bag Specials: First 100 customers per day on Jan 19 - Feb 29, 2024 can receive a Verbatim Power Pack (Only applicable for premium of HK$160 or above, after applying discount). Additionally, customers can join the "Creativity Contest" to win HK$5,000 Trip.com gift card (1 quota) or HK$500 Trip.com gift card (20 quotas). Details of the promotion. Terms and conditions apply.
Free 3-month Deliveroo Plus Silver Membership. Terms and Conditions apply.
New customers who purchase through MoneyHero will receive an exclusive 5% discount code from Generali Insurance for booking Mainland China hotels (applicable to Mainland China hotels available for booking on Travel Expert's website). The gift is provided by Generali Insurance. Promotion period valid till 29 Feb 2024.
